item.title: Make defected MLAs resign, face by polls: KTR challenges Telangana CM
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) working president KT Rama Rao (KTR) on Saturday, September 13, has once again challenged Telangana chief minister A Revanth Reddy to let the defected MLAs resign and face by-elections.
â€œThe condition of these MLAs is pitiable. They may feel safe, but the Supreme Court is serious about their defections. Irrespective of whatever (CM) Revanth and Congress may try, by-elections are inevitable, and when they are held, Congress and Revanth will be taught a befi...]]>
item.author: News Desk
